meanings.definition: A type of sandwich originating from New Orleans, typically made with Italian meats, cheeses, and olive salad on a round loaf of bread.
meanings.sent1: I ordered two muffulettas for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The deli down the street makes delicious muffulettas.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone wanted a taste of the giant muffulettas.
meanings.sent4: The muffulettas at the party were disappearing faster than I could grab one.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked muffulettas filled the room.

meanings.sent1: We shared the muffulettas among our friends.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed muffulettas as one of their specialties.
meanings.sent3: The muffulettas on the table looked like a mountain of deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: The muffulettas in the display case beckoned to hungry customers.
meanings.sent5: The muffulettas were a hit at the potluck dinner.
